# Prosperia Wiki Contribution PR

## 1. Reason for Changes

- Explain **why** you made these edits.
  Examples: fixed typos, added a new rule, clarified instructions, updated formatting.

## 2. Notes

- Any special instructions, context, or considerations for the reviewer

## 3. Checklist

- [ ] I have checked my Markdown formatting
- [ ] I have updated front-matter if adding a new page
- [ ] I have added images/assets if needed
